title: Water for Love :
description: Evadne is the Soteria, the leader of her tribe. She is used to making hard choices. When their water source is contaminated she is the one that has to sentence the culprit to die. She is the one who has to find a way for the rest of them to live. Being Soteria is a lonely life, but for a moment, a pair of strong arms lends her heart hope for companionship. However, the price for water is dear and the Desert Law fierce. Her tribe must come first, even above her own happiness.Water for Love is an epic fantasy romance short story. life forever.
author: Khidra Kay
